summary: When an American family moves into a haunted mansion in England, the family's teenage daughter could be the key in fulfilling a prophecy and finally set the house's ghost free.
cast: Patrick Stewart|Neve Campbell|Joan Sims|Donald Sinden|Cherie Lunghi|Edward Wiley|Leslie Phillips|Daniel Betts|Ciar√°n Fitzgerald|Raymond Pickard|Paul Brightwell
title: El fantasma de Canterville
